title: Beautiful brick&timber 2bed/2ba -loft, laundry,parking available
posting_body: Originally built in 1897, The Harbor Lofts is an award winning warehouse loft conversion in 1996 at the corner of Spear and Harrison Streets.
This unique landmark property with stunning architectural details such as exposed brick and timber, tall ceilings combine the old charm and the modern amenities.
The following 2 level -2 bed/2ba top corner unit is available for immediate move in:
*Great natural light and 20 ft. ceilings provide for a dramatic entertaining setting
*2 bed/2ba on 2 levels with approx.
1,450 sq.ft of living space
*Open floor plan for the living room/dining area and cooking island is perfect for gatherings
*Remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances (large fridge, new electric stove, dishwasher)
*Spacious master bedroom with skylight, closet and in-suite bathroom on the 2nd floor
*2nd bedroom downstairs is also spacious with double closet
*Full size bathroom with shower over tub on the main level
*Hardwood floors in living room, kitchen and hallways
*Wall to wall carpet in both bedrooms
*Washer/dryer in unit
*Electric baseboard heaters throughout the unit
*Secure gated complex with digital codes at front entrance
*Extra $300 for  1 parking space in carport (gated complex)
*Rent includes water and garbage
*Minimum 6 months lease
*Security deposit is 1.25x rent with good credit
Located next to the Embarcadero waterfront with beautiful scenic views of the Bay Bridge and sunny weather, it is the place to enjoy San Francisco at its best!
Great restaurants are minutes away as well as walking distance to AT&T Park, Ferry Building, Farmers Market, Google, Salesforce and the Financial District.
Muni, Caltrain, 101, 280 and 80 freeways are immediately accessible to the Peninsula, South Bay or the East Bay.
